name: Project Umbra
description:
*IMPORTANT*

This game was designed as a class project for level design. Thus there will be a lot of bugs, I will continue to try to update this to fix any and all bugs. However, this project is still a very cool and done project and I hope you enjoy it!

*DESCRIPTION*

In Project Umbra, you play as a scout for a team of explorers who recently landed on the surface of an alien planet. The area you landed in has lush plant life, but before you landed there was a strange alien structure found to the north of where you landed. On your journey, you can uncover lore about the planet, the alien structure, and even who was here before you. Your task is to explore and find a safe route to this structure for your team to follow. This game is mainly a puzzle/platformer and will take about thirty minutes to an hour to complete. 

If you do decide to give it a try and play it, I really appreciate it. Thank you!

  *NOTES*

- Version 1.5

- Lots of bugs.

*CONTROLS*

MOVES - WASD

CAMERA - MOUSE

SHOOT - LEFT CLICK

AIM - RIGHT CLICK

INTERACT - E

PAUSE - P or ESC

SHIFT - RUN

SPACE - JUMP

*CREDITS*

-Khelben Leonard

-Michael Mayer

-Leanne Imkamp

-Declan Shiner

As well as most of the assets are from multiple packs by Synty Studio. If you haven't checked them out you totally should!

Made in: Unreal 4.26
